org.apache.lucene.monitor

Interface MatcherFactory<T extends QueryMatch>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - a subclass of CandidateMatcher

    public interface MatcherFactory<T extends QueryMatch>
    Interface for the creation of new CandidateMatcher objects

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CandidateMatcher<T> createMatcher(IndexSearcher searcher)
      Create a new CandidateMatcher object, to select queries to match against the passed-in IndexSearcher
